<title level="1" right="Action">[Liberating Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=7) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 107 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger** An enemy damages, [Grabs](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18), or [Grapples](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) your ally, and both are within 15 feet of you.

</column>

---

You free an ally from restraint. If the trigger was an ally taking damage, the ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level. The ally can attempt to break free of effects [grabbing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20), [restraining](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33), [immobilizing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), or [paralyzing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) them. They either attempt a new save against one such effect that allows a save, or attempt to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) from one effect as a free action. If they can move, the ally can Step as a free action, even if they didn’t need to escape.
name: Liberating Step
